name: Getting Started
content:
# Getting Started

Projeyi yüklemek için

```js
npm i -S @re-flex/ui
// yada
yarn add @re-flex/ui
```

menu.name: Avatar
Card
menu.content:
import { Card, Avatar, Button, Text } from "@re-flex/ui"; import BasicCard from "./Examples/JS/Basic.jsx" import ImageCard from "./Examples/JS/Image.jsx" ## Introduction ## dataDisplay.card.titles.basic
## dataDisplay.card.titles.image
### Use shadow - Şuan 25 seviyeye kadar otomatik gölgelendirmeyi `shadow={0...24}` aralığında girerek yapabilirsiniz. - Yakın zamanda gölge oluşturucu entegre edilerek teorik olarak sonsuz gölgelendirmeyi projeye kazandıracağız. - Ayrıca Gölge oluşturucu ile yaklaşık 800byte alan kazanmamızı da sağlayacaktır ```js live=true column=true
{new Array(6).fill("").map((_, shadowLevel) => ( Level:{shadowLevel} ))}
``` ## Properties

menu.name: Carousel
menu.content: import { Carousel } from "@re-flex/ui"; import ListSample from "./Carousel"; # Carousel ## Basic usage ```js live=true ``` ## Properties

menu.name: Chip
List
menu.content:
import { List, Button } from "@re-flex/ui";
import ListSample from "./List.tsx";

# List

## Basic usage

<ListSample />

```js live=true
<List>
  <List.Item
    button
    title="List Item 1"
    description="List Item Description"
    rightItem={
      <Button variant="outlined" size={12}>
        Add
      </Button>
    }
  />
</List>
```

## Properties

<Props of={List} />

menu.name: Progressbar
menu.content:
import {
  List,
  Button,
  CircularProgressbar,
  LinearProgressbar,
} from "@re-flex/ui";

# Progressbar

## Circular Progressbar

```js live=true
<>
  <CircularProgressbar value={50}></CircularProgressbar>
  <CircularProgressbar indeterminate></CircularProgressbar>
</>
```

### Properties

<Props of={CircularProgressbar} />

### Linear Progressbar

```js live=true
<>
  <LinearProgressbar value={50}></LinearProgressbar>
  <LinearProgressbar indeterminate></LinearProgressbar>
</>
```

### Properties

<Props of={LinearProgressbar} />

menu.name: Buttons
menu.content:
import { Box, Button, ButtonBase } from "@re-flex/ui"; import { GenerateButton, GenerateButtonCodes } from "./Variants"; # With Icon ### Example Usage ```js live=true <> Based Button ``` # Sizes ### Example Usage ```js live=true <> ``` # Variants > default value = "text" > Options => "text" | "contained" | "outlined" ## Contained Buttons

menu.name: DatePickers
Input
menu.content:
import { TextField, Button, Box } from "@re-flex/ui";

## Basic usage

### Example

```js live=true column=true
<>
  <Box bgColor="#0001" radius={[16, 16, 0, 0]} width="auto" pt={8}>
    <TextField fullWidth startAdornment={<Button>H</Button>} />
  </Box>
  <TextField tag="textarea" startAdornment={<Button>H</Button>} />
</>
```

### Filled

```js live=true column=true
<>
  <Box bgColor="#0001" radius={[16, 16, 0, 0]} width="auto" pt={8}>
    <TextField fullWidth startAdornment={<Button>H</Button>} />
  </Box>
  <TextField tag="textarea" endAdornment={<Button>H</Button>} />
  <TextField tag="div" endAdornment={<Button>H</Button>} />
</>
```

### Outlined

```js live=true  column=true
<>
  <TextField variant="outlined" startAdornment={<Button>H</Button>} />
  <TextField
    variant="outlined"
    tag="textarea"
    endAdornment={<Button>H</Button>}
  />
  <TextField variant="outlined" tag="div" endAdornment={<Button>H</Button>} />
</>
```

## Properties

<Props of={TextField} />

menu.name: TextField
menu.content:
import { TextField, Button, Box } from "@re-flex/ui";

## Basic usage

### Example

```js live=true column=true
<>
  <TextField label="Standart" startAdornment={<Button>Hi</Button>} />
  <TextField label="Outlined" variant="outlined" />
  <TextField
    label="Filled(Custom Style)"
    onChange={console.log}
    fieldProps={{ bgColor: "#0001", radius: [16, 16, 0, 0], pt: 8 }}
  />
</>
```

### Filled

```js live=true column=true
<>
  <TextField label="Outlined" />
  <TextField
    fullWidth
    label="Filled(Custom Style)"
    fieldProps={{ bgColor: "#0001", radius: [16, 16, 0, 0], pt: 8 }}
  />
</>
```

### Outlined

```js live=true  column=true
<>
  <TextField label="Outlined" variant="outlined" />
</>
```

## Properties

<Props of={TextField} />

menu.name: Collapse
Grid
menu.content:
import { Grid } from "@re-flex/ui";
import GridSimple from "./index.tsx";

## Basic usage

```js live=true
<Grid gap={24}>
  <Grid.Col xs={12} md={6} lg={3}>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} />
  </Grid.Col>
  <Grid.Col xs={12} md={6} lg={3}>
    <Box bgColor="#ff99ff" p={40} radius={6} />
  </Grid.Col>
  <Grid.Col xs={12} md={6} lg={3}>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} />
  </Grid.Col>
  <Grid.Col xs={12} md={6} lg={3}>
    <Box bgColor="#ff99ff" p={40} radius={6} />
  </Grid.Col>
</Grid>
```

```js live=true
<Grid gap={24}>
  <Grid.Col xs={12} md={6} lg={3}>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} />
  </Grid.Col>
  <Grid.Col width={5} height={4}>
    <Box bgColor="#ff99ff" p={40} radius={6} />
  </Grid.Col>
  <Grid.Col width={2}>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} />
  </Grid.Col>
  <Grid.Col width={5}>
    <Box bgColor="#ff99ff" p={40} radius={6} />
  </Grid.Col>
  <Grid.Col width={4}>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} />
  </Grid.Col>
</Grid>
```

## Properties

<Props of={Grid} />

menu.name: Hidden
menu.content:
import { Hidden,Box } from "@re-flex/ui";
import BoxSimple from "./index.tsx";

## Basic usage

### Up

```js live=true column=true
<>
  <Hidden xsUp>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} m={4}>xsUp</Box>
  </Hidden>
    <Hidden smUp>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} m={4}>smUp</Box>
  </Hidden>
    <Hidden mdUp>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} m={4}>mdUp</Box>
  </Hidden>
    <Hidden lgUp>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} m={4}>lgUp</Box>
  </Hidden>
    <Hidden xlUp>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} m={4} >xlUp</Box>
  </Hidden>
</>
```


### Down

```js live=true column=true
<>
  <Hidden xsDown>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} m={4}>xsDown</Box>
  </Hidden>
    <Hidden smDown>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} m={4}>smDown</Box>
  </Hidden>
    <Hidden mdDown>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} m={4}>mdDown</Box>
  </Hidden>
    <Hidden lgDown>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} m={4}>lgDown</Box>
  </Hidden>
    <Hidden xlDown>
    <Box bgColor="#f0f0f0" p={40} radius={6} m={4} >xlDown</Box>
  </Hidden>
</>
```

## Properties

<Props of={Hidden} />

menu.name: Menu
menu.content:
import Menu from "./index.tsx";

# Menu

## Properties

## Basic usage

<Menu />

```jsx
<Popper
  paperProps={{ p: [4, 0], radius: 0 }}
  content={
    <List>
      {Array(2 + Math.floor((Math.random() * 999) % 6))
        .fill("")
        .map((i, k) => (
          <List.Item size={12} key={k} button title={`Menu Item ${k + 1}`} />
        ))}
    </List>
  }
>
  <Button>Menu Example</Button>
</Popper>
```

<!-- ## Using different kinds

```js live=true
  <Alert kind="info">Some message</Alert>
  <Alert kind="positive">Some message</Alert>
  <Alert kind="negative">Some message</Alert>
  <Alert kind="warning">Some message</Alert>
``` -->
